entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7 except minus 15 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 except minus 15 inland. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
